actions.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 236 (Roll no. 273).

description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS program by $15 million and reduce NASA mission support funding by $15 million.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 46 in the Congressional Record of June 19, 1996, to increase funds appropriated in the bill for housing opportunities for people with AIDS by $15 million and to reduce funds apppropriated for NASA Mission Support by a comparable amount.
